::Grounded::
"Not yet Trinity...but do you wnat to help me do somehting very 
important?"

He opened a commlink to the bot Aerotaur.
"I am going to search for base defenses in this ship....I will take 
Trinity with me....it should keep her mind off fighting for a while.  
Don't worry bout the entrance to the base...I have it covered with a 
super thick wall of vines that will take alot to get through. Is this 
all right with you?"

> 
> Trinity looked worried to the dragon "It's time to help them, 
> Grounded" said the little-one "This guy needs that a fearsome

>

>

bad
